name: lore-monorepo
description: This is the monorepo for Lore

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean:group1: npm run clean:lore && npm run clean:lore-actions && npm run clean:lore-hook-dialogs-bootstrap
scripts.clean:group2: npm run clean:lore-hook-dialogs-material-ui && npm run clean:lore-hook-websockets
scripts.clean:group3: npm run clean:lore-models && npm run clean:lore-reducers
scripts.clean: npm run clean:group1 && npm run clean:group2 && npm run clean:group3
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node
scripts.test:group1: npm run test:lore && npm run test:lore-actions && npm run test:lore-cli && npm run test:lore-generate
scripts.test:group2: npm run test:lore-generate-collection && npm run test:lore-generate-component && npm run test:lore-generate-generator
scripts.test:group3: npm run test:lore-generate-github && npm run test:lore-generate-model && npm run test:lore-generate-new
scripts.test:group4: npm run test:lore-generate-reducer && npm run test:lore-generate-surge && npm run test:lore-generate-tutorial
scripts.test:group5: npm run test:lore-hook-dialogs-bootstrap && npm run test:lore-hook-dialogs-material-ui && npm run test:lore-hook-websockets
scripts.test:group6: npm run test:lore-models && npm run test:lore-reducers
scripts.test: npm run test:group1 && npm run test:group2 && npm run test:group3 && npm run test:group4 && npm run test:group5 && npm run test:group6
